post.body: I know. Gotta live it up on your birthday.
I won't be home!
haha it's fun
thx!
thanks for the tip
your bday is the 5th? That's Mine too. And ice never had a rum cake
haha your welcome. Live in minnesnowta?
Just arrived in Chestwick PA. Me Joe and Ben are going to shower at the YMCA and swim!
Underwearing it in the van on the way to jersey
Hanging with my bambi. :)
Bambi just hijacked this ;)
first we the kings show = SOLD OUT! sitting outside in florida with our tour manager in shorts and a tshirt.
Florida here i come. C Y A !!!!
Brunch with Grandma again. Easter/Drunk with the Brown family. Early bedtime because we're leaving for florida tomorrow morning :)
Laundry, food shopping, and getting my stuff ready. Lunch with grandma soon. 48 hours until I leave and I'm already packing.
long day/night. me and my dad just got WASTED. so fun!
Just woke up to 6 inches of snow. We leave for Florida to start tour in 3 days. Why can't i leave now? F U C K this!
About to go to sleep so I can lay down some guest vocals tomorrow. Thank you Brett Gurewitz for teaching me how to use Twitter!
Last night of tour in the van :(
Come to the triple rock in Minneapolis at 5. Celebrating my birthday. Justin from motion cities side project is playing. So come party!
Bumpin The Fray. I love this band. Totally on getting to see their show at 1st avenue with my mom on Thursday.
Feeling loose. At the liquor store picking up 2 cases of corona, 3 bottles of wine, brandy, and vodka for my birthday dinner/family party
good morning. getting ready to head out for an hour long massage. hellllllz yea!
Just layed down vocals on Derek Smiths hip hop project and now getting drunk wit my daddy off PBR (pat brown ribbon)
Driving all our gear to a studio in uptown for recording on Monday. All day date with these kids.
Nah, dvd
Always sunny in Philly marathon with Kieren and Nate
